quest_desc.qkname: Land of Memory, Person in Your Heart

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Manager Maisa${action:Talk}
Welcome! I have a job for you.

$Hologram Norfe$
…………………………………………………

$Boy$
(It's a wily-looking boy.)

$Inventor Narlin$
Pfft... What are you talking about?

$Manager Maisa${action:Talk}
You were digging up dirt on Hiver and told Norfe about what you found, right?
Does this mean you're the anonymous informant I heard about?

${user_nick}$
Huh? What? What did you hear?

$Manager Maisa$
Hmm, never mind. Anyway, apparently someone passed on a tip about Child Hiver, and now we have a mission to do some recon on her.
We're going to gather data on Hiver's mana waves and monitor them.

${user_nick}$
So, you want me to go on an intel mission, right?
(Well, if that's all it is... Collecting intel on Hiver shouldn't be a problem.)

$Manager Maisa$
Yep, if you head to Blue Wind Plains, you'll find a site that used to be the home of Hiver. It's nothing but ruins now, though…
I'll mark it on your map.
Right next to the housing lot is a damaged tombstone. If you find the tombstone, you'll be able find the abandoned house.

${user_nick}$
Is there anything left there worth finding? Thieves have probably already ransacked the house...

$Manager Maisa$
Who knows? We might as well spend our available budget to send someone, though.
Bring anything from there relating to Hiver. Have a safe journey!

$Grele$
(Standing silently with his back to you. He seems completely lost in thought.)

$Damaged Grave$
(There is a grave that was damaged by someone.)

${user_nick}$
Hey… What are you thinking, traveling here alone?
Hiver might attack you at some point, you know… You should go back to Rhadames.

$Grele$
………………

${user_nick}$
Hello? Can you hear me? Helloooo! Grele? I said it's dangerous here!

${user_nick}$
This is… No way.

$Grele${action:Talk}
What...? What's so dangerous? And this... It's me?!

${user_nick}$
(That's what I was gonna say. What is going on here?

$Grele$
(Grele approaches the other Grele, who is standing still, and carefully looks at him.)
Hey, it's a fake. It's a hologram. Why would someone do this here, of all places…?

${user_nick}$
What? How do you-…? (Upon close inspection, it is indeed a hologram.)
No way… Was this made by Shalica?

$Grele$
(He is startled at the mention of Shalica. A closer look reveals that his eyes are red from crying.)
Who are you to know Lica? Something tells me you weren't the one who put this here.

${user_nick}$
(Damn, he must've been watching me this whole time. I better be careful if I want to avoid a fight.)
You could say I know her. I am the mercenary {user_nick}. I came here… on a mission from Norfe.

$Grele$
Norfe hired you? Why?

${user_nick}$
I was told to bring back any items related to Hiver. They are trying to protect you.
Something about monitoring her mana waves? As you can imagine, I was surprised to see you here. So…

$Grele$
You came to warn me, is that it?
(He seems to grow less wary.)

${user_nick}$
Well, yeah, pretty much.
But, what are doing here? Did Norfe send you?

$Grele$
……I……

${user_nick}$
(Ugh, he's gonna cry again. What is this about...?)
Well, you don't have to talk about it if you don't want. I'll just see to my mission and be on my way...

$Grele$
… I came to bury this.
(Pulls out a small device similar to what Anna showed you earlier; the portable recorder that played Hiver's song.)

${user_nick}$
That's…
Grele, Hiver is no longer your sister.

$Grele$
(Tries to hold back, but tears well up in his eyes.)
... In the past, I would have been angry to hear that. But now I have come to accept that fact.

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9931_sp_01.ogg}
My sister... She died for me. She died shielding me from the soldiers of Tryan…

${user_nick}$
Grele…

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9931_sp_02.ogg}
You know, I... I once thought I should just die and give up my jewel to my sister if she wanted.
Sometimes I even wished my sister was the mutant, not me.
So I tried to find the Cup of Healing... I thought maybe I could save my sister with that.

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9931_sp_03.ogg}
But… as time passed and my sister grew more powerful, that feeling also became stronger.
The things I felt, those terrible feelings... I grew to hate everything around me at first, though nothing else had changed...

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9931_sp_04.ogg}
She keeps... She just keeps killing everything. I only realized recently what that feeling truly was...
She's really dead. I can give her my life, but... That won't be the end of it... Yet, I couldn't bring myself to tell anyone about it.

${user_nick}$
… So you came here to bury that thing?

$Grele$
Yes. Because the sister I knew… She is in here.

${user_nick}$
You sure have grown up.

$Damaged Grave$
(There is a grave that was damaged by someone.)

$Grele${action:Talk}
… You speak as if you know me.

${user_nick}$
(No way am I telling you that we almost fought before.)
Well… You're quite famous. Everyone knows about the Anti-Goddess Faction's mutant Child.

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9931_sp_05.ogg}
Whatever... I just... I want to hear my sister's voice one last time.
(Grele plays the recorder one last time.)

$Hiver's Song Device${sound:DRAGON NEST_BGM_Evt_Song of Hiver.ogg}
I have nothing to eat and nothing to wear.
Nothing to lose, so I have no fears. Nothing to leave behind when I die.

${user_nick}$
(It's a sweet but haunting voice. The one you heard before...)

$Child Hiver of Memory$
That's none of your concern. But if you see him, kill him.
You'll get bonus points if you bring me his jewel. Hehehe…

${user_nick}$
(How can she have changed so much? Child or not, she's still...)

$Hiver's Song Device$
And nothing to be remembered for when I die. Nothing to be remembered for when I die...

${user_nick}$
(The lyrics reflect Hiver's fate perfectly. She just disappeared.)

$Hiver's Song Device$
(You don't hear anything else. It seems like that's it.)

$Grele$
(Grele stood silently for a while as if chasing the lingering emotions of the song, then raises his head.)
Now… I will bury you.

${user_nick}$
Beneath this tomb?

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9931_sp_06.ogg}
Yes. This is where she was initially laid to rest. Right here.

${user_nick}$
Are you sure you won't regret it? What if you want to hear the song again?

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9931_sp_07.ogg}
I'll have no need. My sister is here.
(Puts his hand on his heart.)

${user_nick}$
All right, let me help you.

$Damaged Grave$
(There is a grave that was damaged by someone.)

$Fake Grele$
(An exquisitely designed hologram.
It is as vivid as the fake self-likeness that Shalica made before.)

$Grele$
Thanks.

$Damaged Grave$
(Grele places the recorder in the grave and covers it with dirt. Time to tidy up the grave site.)

$Damaged Grave$
(It lacks an epitaph, but Grele doesn't seem to want one.)

$Hiver's Grave$
(It would be nice to leave a few flowers or something…)

$Manager Maisa${action:Talk}
You're back. Good timing; I've been waiting for you.

${user_nick}$
Waiting for me, huh? What for?

$Manager Maisa$
Yes, Norfe wants to see you. I assume you brought back something?
I haven't even reported the results, but he says he wants to pay you for the job, so...

${user_nick}$
Haha… man. All right then, I'll go see him.
(He toys with me and then says he wants to pay me? Fine, let's see what this is about.)

$Manager Maisa$
See you later!

$Hologram Norfe$
You're back.

${user_nick}$
Yes, it was an interesting trip. Lots of sites to see.
So, are you gonna tell me what the heck you were thinking?

$Hologram Norfe$
I don't know what you mean.
Was it such a strange request to ask you to find clues about Hiver's mana waves?

${user_nick}$
Well, that in itself wasn't weird. What threw me off a bit was the fact that there was nothing to find but a pretty hologram of the mutant Child.
It made me think there might be a surveillance device installed nearby or something.

$Hologram Norfe$
There's nothing more I can tell you.

${user_nick}$
You called me here to say that? Are you toying with me?

$Hologram Norfe${sound:npc_Hologram_Norphee_qu9931_sp_01.ogg}
I know that you are receiving orders from Hwaran.
Your meeting with Hiver... It was done at the behest of Hwaran, who has ordered you to support Hiver.

${user_nick}$
… Pfft. That's news to me!

$Hologram Norfe${sound:npc_Hologram_Norphee_qu9931_sp_02.ogg}
Do you think I don't know about you?
The thief of the Finest Stone Jade suddenly shows up in the Blue Clan Territory, and then the Red Child appears. Need I say more?

${user_nick}$
Wow, your intel is impeccable. So much so that my feelings are hurt.

$Hologram Norfe${sound:npc_Hologram_Norphee_qu9931_sp_03.ogg}
I'm sure you have your own reasons for warning me before. Several of them, no doubt.

${user_nick}$
Say, for example, approaching you with seeming good will and getting you to let your guard down so I can find out where you really are?

$Hologram Norfe$
Well, that's one of the possibilities.

${user_nick}$
Is that why you tried playing that obvious trick on me? Because you thought I would attempt to kill Grele on sight?

$Hologram Norfe${sound:npc_Hologram_Norphee_qu9931_sp_04.ogg}
That's the point of a decoy; to be obvious, yet irresistible.
I thought that bait would at least lead you to go inform Hiver. If not... Then there might be hope for you after all.

${user_nick}$
I understand where you were coming from, but I still find it annoying, old man.
If I wanted you dead, I would have killed you. Same goes for the boy.

$Hologram Norfe${sound:npc_Hologram_Norphee_qu9931_sp_05.ogg}
Hehehe... I could say the same for you. It's not like we're rookies here. But... you didn't, did you?
I care about actions, not words. No matter what someone says, a person's actions tell the story.

${user_nick}$
… Is that why you even used Grele as bait? What if I killed him?

$Hologram Norfe$
(For the first time, the hologram seems at a loss for words.)

$Hologram Norfe${sound:npc_Hologram_Norphee_qu9931_sp_06.ogg}
…… That was my one mistake.
I didn't know Grele would go there too…

${user_nick}$
... He's your only hope, so you might want to keep track of him.

$Hologram Norfe${sound:npc_Hologram_Norphee_qu9931_sp_07.ogg}
Don't worry about that. Anyway, your integrity... Let's say it's somewhat proven.

${user_nick}$
That's funny. I'm already regretting coming here, so please stop talking.

$Hologram Norfe$
Well, I guess your choices are limited, but...… Crrrr…… This-Crrrr……… Another…… (His voice is inaudible due to some kind of interference.)

${user_nick}$
What's wrong with you? Are you guys running out of money these days? You said you were going to fix it.
Ugh… Should I just go…?

$Inventor Narlin${action:Talk}
Let's see here… (Narlin looks over the device briefly.)
It's not playing anything but the recorded greeting. Tsk...

${user_nick}$
What a hunk of junk.

$Inventor Narlin${sound:npc_Narlin_qu9931_sp_01.ogg}
There's a lot of dust here. Tsk, this time it won't be an easy fix.
I don't think it's going to play any sound for a while. What should I do?

${user_nick}$
(How am I supposed to know what to do?)

$Boy${action:Talk}
Um… {user_nick}?

${user_nick}$
You again? What is it this time?

$Boy$
I was told to give you this. I think it's your payment for the mission.
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: Sudden Investigation Request
journal.contents:
You finished speaking with Norfe and returned. Since you have nothing to do while waiting for Hiver to get in touch, you might as well see if there are any missions to be carried out.

Rhadames - Manager Maisa
journal.destination: Talk to Manager Maisa in Rhadames

journal.title: Scars from the Past
journal.contents:
It seems Rhadames is doing its own investigation of Hiver. It's not going to harm Hiver, nor is it a violation of Hwaran's orders. It can't hurt to head to Blue Wind Plains to have a look at the site where Hiver once lived.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Merca (Blue Sand Trade Route) → Blue Wind Plains (Empty Plot of Land)
journal.destination: (Solo) Find Empty Plot of Land in the Blue Wind Plains
journal.todo_msg: Investigate the Empty Plot of Land in the Blue Wind Plains. It is nearby the damaged gravestone.

journal.title: A Defenseless Target
journal.contents:
It's Grele! What should you do…? Maybe it would be best to warn him. Hiver could attack at any moment, so it isn't wise for him to travel alone like this.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Merca (Blue Sand Trade Route) → Blue Wind Plains (Grele)
journal.todo_msg: Grele is standing there by himself. Go warn him of the danger.

journal.title: A Second Boy
journal.contents:
You attempted to warn Grele, but the boy didn't even turn around when you spoke. Then another Grele suddenly appeared. What is going on here? You better speak with this new Grele for now.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Merca (Blue Sand Trade Route) → Blue Wind Plains (Grele)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Grele in the Blue Wind Plains
journal.todo_msg: Grele suddenly appeared. Talk to him.

journal.title: Song in the Wind
journal.contents:
The lyrics of a song without a singer flow through the lazy breeze. The time has come to say goodbye to this longed-for person who can only be buried in the hearts of those who remember her, along with Hiver's song that Grele carried in the recorder.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Merca (Blue Sand Trade Route) → Blue Wind Plains (Grele)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Grele in the Blue Wind Plains
journal.todo_msg: Listen to Hiver's song with Grele.

journal.title: A Second Grave
journal.contents:
A damaged grave where someone once was laid to rest for a time. You should fix up the grave.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Merca (Blue Sand Trade Route) → Blue Wind Plains (Damaged Grave)
journal.todo_msg: Help Grele fix up a grave for Hiver.

journal.title: Bury Those Lost Forever in Your Heart
journal.contents:
You carried out a funeral in bitter silence. Now it's time to return and report to Manager Maisa in Rhadames.

Rhadames - Manager Maisa
journal.destination: Talk to Manager Maisa in Rhadames
journal.todo_msg: Go to Rhadames and talk to Manager Maisa.

journal.title: An Old Fox's Game
journal.contents:
Manager Maisa says Norfe is looking for you. Maybe Norfe means to pay you directly. You'll have to have a word or two with that old man after the tricked he just played on you.

Rhadames - Hologram Norfe
journal.destination: Talk to Hologram Norfe in Rhadames
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Hologram Norfe in Rhadames.

journal.title: Broken Speaker
journal.contents:
The hologram's speaker broke in the middle of your conversation with Norfe. They say Rhadames is known for using advanced technology, but that seems more like hype than anything. Talk to Inventor Narlin, who just rushed up beside you.

Rhadames - Inventor Narlin
journal.destination: Talk to Inventor Narlin in Rhadames

journal.title: Another Call
journal.contents:
That errand boy from before has approached again. He seems to have a message for you since the audio of that machine is broken. Speak with the boy.

Rhadames - Boy
journal.todo_msg: Talk to the boy who approached your side.
